name: Rest Bus 4 Sleep
description:
You stayed up too late and crashed your car in the desert.

Luckily you are next to a bus stop and the bus will be arriving in 1 minute and 40 seconds, but all your documents scatter around you.

I made this for the desert bus game jam and I hope those of you playing will enjoy this and donate to childs play.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

E or spacebar to pick up the documents.

F and/or C to force yourself awake if you fall asleep.
